resources.string: set HashCaller as Default SMS to block SMS
This persons is in your contact
By continuing, you agree to Terms & privacy notice
To identify and block incoming phone calls HashCaller need access to your phone state
To prevent Blocking your contacts and enable searching.
HashCaller needs your permissions for caller ID, spam detection and call blocking to work.
Allow access to contacts to prevent blocking your contacts and enable searching.
Allow phone access to block spam calls and identify incoming calls.
Allow contacts access and phone access to caller Id and spam detection to work properly.
HashCaller needs access to your contacts and phone call state for caller Id to work and enable searching
SMS sent by scammers appear hear.
Calls identified as spam will appear here.
Enable display over other apps to show caller Id during incoming calls.
Set HashCaller as default caller ID to block and identify incoming calls, without this call blocking and caller Id functionality will not work properly.
HashCaller needs access to contacts to identify unknown calls and to enabling searching.
